activities: Market Certitude, LLC is a marketing research and consulting firm working principally with the pharmaceutical industry. Medical Data Analytics (MDA) is a trading name of a division of Market Certitude.  This division is the health economics and outcomes research arm of the company. Our core business is the design and conduct of patient chart studies, including providing analysis and interpretation of study findings. We work directly with practicing physicians and / or key opinion leaders to design and implement these studies. Typical data collected from medical charts includes information on prescribed medications and treatment regimens, dosing characteristics, switching and discontinuation, length of therapy, and adverse effects and their management.  The data transferred by Market Certitude includes data related to staff administration in connection with our suppliers, customers and their affiliates; accounts and records; advertising, marketing and public relations and health records.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Medical Records; Advertising, Marketing and Public Relations; Accounts & Records.  This includes data on customers, vendors and employees
recoursemech:
For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); for all other data: NIPC Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Scheme
(https://sites.google.com/site/nipcarbitration/home/safe-harbor)
